description:
It might be summer, but America still has "Frozen" fever. After the animated movie was released on Nov. 27, 2013, it proceeded to win two Academy Awards, take over the Disney theme parks and even have its characters on "Once Upon a Time." Now "Frozen" is getting a one-hour making-of special that will air on ABC.虽然已是夏季，不过《冰雪奇缘》的冰雪热还没过去。在这部电影2013年11月27日上映以来，已经获得了赢得了2项奥斯卡奖项，成为迪士尼主题公园重要元素而且还将和《童话镇》串剧。最新消息是，《冰雪奇缘》将会在ABC电视台播出一集长达1小时的幕后制作特辑。

It will premiere on Sept. 2 at 8 p.m. ET/PT. The special will look inside Walt Disney Animation Studios and allow audiences to hear from directors Chris Buck and Jennifer Lee and producers behind the project.这集特别节目将会在9月2日晚8点播出，将会带观众走进华特迪士尼动画片厂，让观众倾听导演Chris Buck和Jennifer Lee和拍片背后的故事。

Beyond looking behind-the-scenes of "Frozen," the special will also look into the franchise's future.在《冰雪奇缘》幕后故事特辑中，我们还会了解这部动画片的未来规划。
